summary: Provides helper functions for ASR spellchecking customization, including loading index and n‑gram mappings, extracting and processing text from data manifests, applying and validating replacement rules, managing candidate alignments, and updating manifests with corrected transcriptions.
business_intent: Enable the creation and refinement of spellchecking datasets for automatic speech recognition by offering utilities that handle data extraction, rule‑based text correction, alignment of candidate corrections, and manifest updates, thereby improving model accuracy.
